`,(0,v.jsxDEV)(o.pre,{children:(0,v.jsxDEV)(o.code,{className:"language-tsx",children:`import { defineDocumentType, makeSource } from "contentlayer/source-files";\r
import rehypePrettyCode from "rehype-pretty-code";\r
\r
export const Post = defineDocumentType(() => ({\r
  name: "Post",\r
  filePathPattern: \`**/*.mdx\`,\r
  contentType: "mdx",\r
  fields: {\r
    title: {\r
      type: "string",\r
      description: "The title of the post",\r
      required: true,\r
    },\r
    description: {\r
      type: "string",\r
      description: "The description of the post",\r
      required: true,\r
    },\r
    date: {\r
      type: "date",\r
      description: "The date of the post",\r
      required: true,\r
    },\r
  },\r
  computedFields: {\r
    url: {\r
      type: "string",\r
      resolve: (post) => \`/posts/\${post._raw.flattenedPath}\`,\r
    },\r
  },\r
}));\r
\r
const rehypeoptions = {\r
  // Use one of Shiki's packaged themes\r
  theme: "one-dark-pro",\r
  // Set to true to keep the background color\r
  keepBackground: true,\r
  onVisitLine(node: any) {\r
    if (node.children.length === 0) {\r
      node.children = [{ type: "text", value: " " }];\r
    }\r
  },\r
  onVisitHighlightedLine(node: any) {\r
    node.properties.className.push("highlighted");\r
  },\r
  onVisitHighlightedWord(node: any, id: any) {\r
    node.properties.className = ["word"];\r
  },\r
};\r
\r
export default makeSource({\r
  contentDirPath: "posts",\r
  documentTypes: [Post],\r
  mdx: {\r
    rehypePlugins: [[rehypePrettyCode, rehypeoptions]],\r
  },\r
});
